pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, August 15, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will arrive at Rideau Hall for a meeting with Her Excellency the Right Honourable Mary Simon, Governor General of Canada. He will be accompanied by Sophie Grégoire Trudeau. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks and hold a media availability.

Rideau Hall
1 Sussex Drive

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Princess Anne Entrance no later than 9:10 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
